songs.title: Mental Evaluation
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
I don’t care what they think about me
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
My mental evaluation says I need help [x2]

[Verse 1]
Steadily positionin a fatal position then I
Choke him out until he's out of commission then I
Drive around looking where I can get to
My dark road out of town with no sign of a witness (woo)
I don’t care about a punk ass shrink
Only ones just to medicate the way I think (here take this)
And I can do that shit on my own
Cause I don't need no help from some unknown
Head therapist telling me how it is (hell no)
He tryna get me to tell him my biz (hell no)
I'm getting pissed I don't need this fool
Thinking that I'm gonna break down and trust you

[Hook]

[Verse 3]
Evaluation huh? I'm no longer a patient
I'm in the back seat of your car just waiting
Cause I don't take what people say about me kindly
So when I see you then I’ll put it all behind me
Not in a good way cause I keep a long grudge
You kept pushing but I would not budge
I be the type that you don’t wanna fight
I'm straight with it you might not come home that night
So say what you will but I don’t need no pill
To turn me into a zombie with no thrill
No i wanna be accidental
And not some test bout me cause you think that I'm mental

[Chorus]
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
I don't care what they think about me
I don’t care what they think about me (evaluation)
My mental evaluation says I need help
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
I don't care what they think about me
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
My mental evaluation says I need help

[Verse 4]
How long have I been mentally insane
And do I think I might need to be restrained
Before I cause myself or someone else pain
With my anger so bad that I can need pain
How long have I've been mentally insane?
(Help, help, help, help)
And do I think I might need to be restrained
(Help, help, help, help)
Before I cause myself or someone else pain
(Help, help, help, help)
With my anger so bad that i can need pain
(Help, help, help, help)

[Chorus]
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
I don't care what they think about me
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
My mental evaluation says I need help
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
I don't care what they think about me
I don't care what they think about me (evaluation)
My mental evaluation says I need help

[Outro]
My mental evaluation says I need help
My mental evaluation says I need help
